Text:
hello sir

i know urnt taking ne request till 2010 .
but plz can u make exception for 
MOVE LIKE MICHAEL JACKSON SERIES ..
i just heard about it yesterday and m very exited about it but on net all rips are 700mb per episdo for just40-50 min duration :(

@htctouch:  "Move..." has 6 parts, each is 700 MB. Even with H264 compression it would be 6 times ~250 MB = 1.5 GB.
Right now (and for sure in foreseeable future) I cannot upload such big packs.
I understand that originals in XviD format have 4.2 GB which makes them too big for majority, but... 1.5 GB doesn't sounds too attractive, even if almost three times smaller...
Sorry.
However, I CAN up them one-by-one, when situation arise... that's best I can. (BTW, I have them all six...)
that would be great even if u post it 1 by 1 . no problem . i think uploading 250 mb file torrent at a time would be no big deal for u and would b much easier than downloading the whl bunch togthr

@htctouch: I just finished re-encoding to H264 first three parts... and here are the news :.)
- 182 MB, 184 MB and 193 MB (differs in durations)
- Input was only one available: watbath's XviDs which were BAD (as always, I must say)
- Output is - shitty (pardon my French), 'cause "GarbageInGarbageOut" - that's why I keep repeating that my inputs MUST be 720p or other HQ...

Only thing why someone should download re-encodings is small file-size (six parts under 1.1 GB) and 6 XviDs are 4.2 GB.

So, htctouch, I will wait for your word - should I proceed or not. You may want to look at 1st episode, and then to decide - I'll up that one if you say so...
So - speak to me, I'm reluctant to up some "problematic" encodings.

dude thanx 4 replying i totaly got ur point

badinput=badoutput .. so bro dont put ne further effort to upload such stuff because i dont want u2 upload non-quality stuff as people expect high from u
ill try downloading the 700mb rips one by one in between n also will take help of frens to download it coz i wont risk to miss this stuff.

thanx 4ur time and concer sir , i realy respect u 4 this , i wish i could do something 4u too ..
